page.title: 02COVENTRY STADIUM,WARKS.
page.content: The Speedway started in 1928, as a purpose built dirt track.There are three tracks and two grandstands with covered accomodation in each. It seats 2000 people but has held 3000 - 5000 people. The car park holds 4000 cars. At a record meeting 33000 people came. On the 1st Saturday in each month there is {Stockcar racing.}There is{Speedway other Saturdays with{Banger car, Hot {Rods, Midgets}etc on dates especially advertised.{Greyhounds race on Tuesdays and Fridays. { Whats here}(eat and drink wise):Trackside full-raceview Restaurant with cocktail bar. Trackside lounges, each enclosure has five raceview bars. Grill, buffet plus four indoor and five outdoor catering points.
